name: Alphabet Soup (Dave Pickett)
description:
I made this game in 48 hours as part of Paint Jam. I wasn't able to finish the 3rd level (boss fight with Marilyn Monroe) in the time limit, so the game just gets stuck there. Special thanks to Jes Klass and Michelle Lega for help brainstorming the concept and jokes.

Controls

  • Z = A button
  • X = B button
  • Arrow keys = D-pad
